segments.text: I notice the boy balancing on that stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so close to falling, and the girl is just standing there, waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes, completely unaware of the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the puddle, but she doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the edge, and she’s still focused on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to slip and fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is turning into a disaster, and no one is doing anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever notice what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just a chaotic scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
